en.description: Endless Lullaby is a Warframe Augment Mod for Baruuk's Lull that causes finishers to re-trigger Lull for some, or all, of it's remaining duration. This mod also passively increases Lull's duration.

ru.description: Endless Lullaby is a Warframe Augment Mod for Baruuk's Lull that causes finishers to re-trigger Lull for some, or all, of it's remaining duration. This mod also passively increases Lull's duration.
